title: Buy Muthoot Finance; target of Rs 1750 : Motilal Oswal - Moneycontrol
content: Buy Muthoot Finance; target of Rs 1750 : Motilal Oswal  Moneycontrol
description: Motilal Oswal is bullish on Muthoot Finance recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1750 in its research report dated March 02, 2022.
